Spring.description: Warm, clear, and light tones. Spring types glow in fresh, bright hues like peach, coral, and golden yellows.
Spring.tone_contrast: Low to medium. Best characterized by a warm undertone and high clarity. They thrive in combinations of light, bright, and saturated colors.
characteristics: Features are typically light, bright, and clear.
Hair often has golden or red highlights; eyes are bright blue, green, or hazel.
Skin is warm or ivory with potential for freckles.
Enhanced by soft, fresh colors that echo nature's renewal.
grooming_tips: Light nail care and natural polish.

Summer.description: Soft, cool, and muted tones. Summers shine in pastels, rose, and misty blues.
Summer.tone_contrast: Low contrast. Cool and muted features blend harmoniously, avoiding jarring color differences. They should select tone-on-tone outfits using their cool palette colors.
characteristics: Features are gentle, soft, and have a cool undertone.
Hair is typically ash blonde or soft brown; eyes are gray-blue or slate.
Skin has a cool, pinkish, or neutral undertone.
Enhanced by hazy, soft pastels and muted cool shades.
grooming_tips: Keep facial hair light and neat.
Pastel ties or pocket squares for style.

Autumn.description: Rich, warm, and earthy tones. Autumns glow in rust, olive, mustard, and terracotta.
Autumn.tone_contrast: Medium to high. Features are primarily deep and warm, with high saturation preferred over pale tones. The contrast is created by mixing rich, earthy colors.
characteristics: Features are deep, rich, and intensely warm.
Hair is usually red, auburn, or deep brown with golden undertones.
Skin is warm, golden, or dark bronze.
Enhanced by deep, spiced, and rustic tones found in nature's harvest.
grooming_tips: Layered clothing enhances the earthy palette.
Dark nail polish optional for fashion-forward.

Winter.description: Cool, bold, and dramatic tones. Winters dazzle in black, icy shades, and jewel tones.
Winter.tone_contrast: High contrast. Characterized by stark differences between hair, eye, and skin color (e.g., dark hair/pale skin). They look best in monochromatic or high-contrast color pairings.
characteristics: Features are striking, intense, and possess a cool undertone.
Hair is often jet black, dark brown, or platinum blonde; eyes are deep or bright cool shades.
Skin can be very pale, olive, or deep, but always cool or neutral-cool.
Enhanced by pure, clear colors, black, white, and jewel tones.
grooming_tips: Leather gloves or belts for accessories.
